text: @NYGovCuomo No, you’re forcing the masks issue. You forced a shutdown of NYS so as not to overwhelm hospitals. You forced nursing homes to accept CoVid19 people that resulted in almost half of NYS CoVid19 deaths. It’s not US, it’s you.
